meanings.definition: Retired or honorably discharged from active professional duty, but retaining the title of one's office or position.
meanings.sent1: The emeritas professor gave a lecture on her favorite topic.
meanings.sent2: She received an emeritas award for her years of service.
meanings.sent3: The emeritas librarian organized the bookshelves by color.
meanings.sent4: The emeritas status was a badge of honor among the retired professionals.
meanings.sent5: The emeritas doctor continued to offer medical advice to her former patients.

meanings.definition: A woman who has retired from a position of authority or honor, especially a university professor.
meanings.sent1: The emeritas was invited to speak at the graduation ceremony.
meanings.sent2: As an emeritas, she still attended academic conferences.
meanings.sent3: The emeritas enjoyed spending time in her garden after retiring.
meanings.sent4: The emeritas' wisdom was sought after by many young scholars.
meanings.sent5: The emeritas professor's legacy continued to inspire future generations.
